title: Major disruption due to track fault between Kranji and Yishun

title_translations.zh-Hans: 克兰芝和义顺之间轨道故障导致大面积中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan besar kerana kerosakan landasan antara Kranji dan Yishun
title_translations.ta: Kranji மற்றும் Yishun இடையே தண்டவாளக் கோளாறு காரணமாக பெரிய இடையூறு

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train svcs btwn #Kranji and #Yishun have resumed. Free regular bus svcs have ended.
[NSL] UPDATE: Train svcs btwn #Kranji and #Yishun have resumed. Free regular bus is still available btwn #Kranji and #Yishun.
[NSL]: Due to a track fault, pls add 25mins train travel time btwn #Kranji and #Yishun. Free regular bus service is available between Yishun and Kranji. Train service is still available.
